title: Kare no 1-Ban ni Naru Houhou
original_name: 彼の 1 番になる方法
sinopse:
The sudden transferring from Tokyo to this country side. In my new school I met a guy who is really popular between the girls. At first, I hated him, but as time goes on, I began to like him. With my skill that is different from the others girl, I will try to get Miya's love....

I want to be your number one...

(Source: Finger Scans)
